verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Fight the good fight With all thy might Christ is thy strength And Christ thy might Lay hold of life and it shall be Thy joy and crown eternally{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Run the straight race Through God's good grace Lift up thine eyes And seek His face Life with its way before us lies Christ is the path and Christ the prize{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Cast care aside Lean on thy Guide His boundless mercy will provide Trust and thy trusting Soul shall prove Christ is its life And Christ its love{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Faint not, nor fear His arms are near He changeth not And thou art dear Only believe And thou shalt see That Christ is all In all to thee{/lang-eng}
